name: Holoreact
description:
Summary

Holoreact is an educational hologram-based game aimed at Indonesian high school students to help them understand chemistry concepts through chemistry experiments. Students can get scores and stars to determine how well they're doing in a particular experiment. All of the experiments have been tailored to match Indonesian's high school curriculum and is not limited to the students' grades/levels. They are free to choose whichever experiments they want to try. It's not timed, just pure exploration.
